title: Butternut squash and mussel soup
description: Give creamy butternut squash soup a flavour twist with mussels. Top with crisp sourdough croûtons for a tasty starter.
ingredients: 200g/7oz mussels, cleaned and de-bearded (discard any mussels with broken shells and any that refuse to close when tapped)
350g/12oz butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1cm/½in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 tbsp olive oil, plus 2 tbsp for drizzling
½ wholemeal sourdough bread, cut into 1cm/½in cubes
